requirements.summary: Create a mobile-first multi-page site with routes for Home, Services, Gallery, About Us, and Contact & Booking, wired through global navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: All 5 pages are accessible via the app navigation without dead links.
Routes render correctly on mobile and desktop viewports.
Page titles/headers and body copy are in English and match the provided sections.

file_operations.description: Create the main app shell with client-side routing for Home, Services, Gallery, About Us, and Contact & Booking, and render a shared layout (navbar + footer) around routed pages.
Create the Home page view and ensure it is routed from the app router.
Create the Services page view and ensure it is routed from the app router.
Create the Gallery page view and ensure it is routed from the app router.
Create the About Us page view and ensure it is routed from the app router.
Create the Contact & Booking page view and ensure it is routed from the app router.

requirements.summary: Implement a consistent luxury design system (black/gold/white, serif headings + sans body, rounded cards, soft shadows, subtle glassmorphism) across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent palette, typography system, and component styling.
Cards and sections visibly use rounded corners, soft shadowing, and glass-like translucent accents where appropriate.
Contrast and readability are acceptable for body text on the chosen background colors.

file_operations.description: Add global Tailwind layers and theme CSS variables to express the black + gold + white palette, default typography (serif headings, sans body), rounded corners, soft shadows, and glassmorphism utility classes (e.g., backdrop blur + translucent backgrounds).
Extend Tailwind theme tokens for the Baidees palette and typography (e.g., fontFamily for serif headings and sans body) and ensure consistent radius/shadow defaults for a premium look.
Wire brand typography (e.g., load an elegant serif and modern sans font via standard HTML includes) and keep the document title aligned with Baidees Salon.
Create a shared layout wrapper that applies global spacing/background, and provides consistent section containers and glassmorphism surfaces for pages.

requirements.summary: Add a sticky, site-wide navbar with route links and prominent CTAs (Book Appointment, Call Now).
acceptanceCriteria: Navbar remains visible while scrolling on mobile and desktop.
Navbar links navigate to the correct page/route.
Book Appointment and Call Now CTAs are discoverable on the site (at minimum on Home and/or Contact/Booking).

file_operations.description: Create a sticky top navigation with links to Home, Services, Gallery, About, and Contact/Booking, plus CTA buttons for Book Appointment (navigates to Contact/Booking) and Call Now (tel: link). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) to ensure consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the Navbar into the shared layout so it appears on every route and remains sticky across all pages.

requirements.summary: Build the Home page with hero, intro, highlighted service cards, before/after slider, testimonials, and CTAs.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero renders full-width with the specified tagline.
Five service highlight cards render with the exact service names provided.
Before/after slider allows switching between at least 2 before/after examples.
Testimonials section displays at least 3 testimonials (placeholder content acceptable).
Book Appointment CTA navigates to the Contact & Booking page; Call Now CTA is a clickable tel: link.

file_operations.description: Implement Home sections: full-width hero using the required hero background asset and tagline “Where Style Meets Confidence”, intro copy, 5 highlight service cards with the exact provided names, before/after slider with 2 examples, testimonials (≥3), and CTAs for Book Appointment (route) + Call Now (tel:). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Button) for premium rounded surfaces and consistent interactions. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create an interactive before/after comparison component (slider or toggle) that can display at least two provided transformation examples and is reusable on Home and Gallery.

Create a testimonials section component that renders at least 3 testimonials with luxury styling (rounded cards, subtle shadow, readable contrast). Use shadcn-ui Card where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a Home-only highlights section that renders the five named services as premium cards and links to the Services page. Use shadcn-ui components (Card/Button) for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build the Services page with categorized services, each showing a price placeholder, benefits description, and duration.
acceptanceCriteria: All categories and all listed services are present.
Each service row/card shows a price placeholder, a short benefits description, and a duration.
Layout is mobile-first with an easy-to-scan structure (cards or accordions acceptable).

file_operations.description: Implement categorized service lists for Hair Services, Hair Treatments, and Skin & Grooming with all required items, each showing a price placeholder, benefits, and duration. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Accordion for categories and Card for items) for mobile-friendly scanning. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a reusable catalog component that renders service categories and service items with benefits, duration, and price placeholder, optimized for mobile-first reading.

requirements.summary: Build the Gallery page with a responsive grid, Instagram-style tile option, and an interactive before/after comparison section.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery shows a responsive grid of at least 9 images (placeholder images acceptable).
A before/after comparison section is present and interactive (slider or toggle).
Grid uses an Instagram-like tile layout on mobile (square tiles, consistent gutters).

file_operations.description: Implement a responsive image grid (≥9 images) mixing hairstyle results and salon interior, with Instagram-style square tiles on mobile, and include a before/after comparison section using the shared before/after component.
Create a gallery grid component that supports an Instagram-style tight square-tile layout with consistent gutters and responsive behavior.
Ensure the before/after component supports usage on the Gallery page (e.g., multiple examples, accessible controls) without layout jank on mobile.

requirements.summary: Build the About Us page with brand story, stylist introductions, hygiene & premium product assurance, and a Why choose us bullet list.
acceptanceCriteria: Page includes all four requested sections with clear headings and readable copy.
Stylists section shows at least 2 stylist profiles (placeholder names/photos acceptable).
“Why choose us” is presented as a bullet list.

file_operations.description: Implement About page sections: story, stylists (≥2 profiles with images), hygiene & premium product assurance, and a Why choose us bullet list, styled with the luxury theme. Use shadcn-ui Card for stylist profiles where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a stylists section component rendering at least two stylist profile cards with local portrait assets and premium styling. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button if needed. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build the Contact & Booking page with booking form, WhatsApp booking link, maps placeholder, and opening hours; submit form to backend booking capability and show success state.
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes required fields: name, phone, service, date, time.
Submitting the form shows a success state and clears or resets the form.
WhatsApp booking button uses a wa.me or whatsapp:// link (with placeholder number if none provided).
A Maps placeholder block is shown (no real map integration required).
Opening hours are displayed in a clear list/table format.

file_operations.description: Implement booking form (name, phone, service, date, time) with validation, success state, and reset behavior; add WhatsApp booking button (wa.me/whatsapp:// with placeholder number), maps placeholder block, and opening hours list/table. Use shadcn-ui components (Input, Select, Button, Card, Alert) to keep styling consistent. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a frontend hook that uses the existing actor hook to call the backend booking capability (bookAppointment) and returns loading/success/error state for the Contact & Booking form.

Create a reusable booking form component used by the Contact & Booking page, including field validation, submit handling via the booking hook, and a success confirmation panel. Use shadcn-ui form inputs/buttons for consistency. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add smooth scroll reveal animations and hover/focus effects across UI while keeping mobile performance and reduced-motion accessibility in mind.
acceptanceCriteria: Interactive elements (buttons, cards, nav links) have visible hover/focus states.
Scrolling through Home/Services/Gallery shows subtle entrance/reveal animations without jank on mobile.
Animations respect accessibility considerations (do not block interaction; prefer reduced motion where feasible).

file_operations.description: Create a lightweight IntersectionObserver-based hook to apply entrance/reveal animations when sections enter the viewport, with prefers-reduced-motion support.
Add global utility classes for subtle hover transitions (lift, glow, underline) and reveal animation styles, including reduced-motion variants to minimize motion when requested.
Apply reveal-on-scroll behavior to key sections (hero intro, highlights, before/after, testimonials, membership/FAQ if present) and ensure hover/focus states are visible and performant on mobile.
Apply subtle reveal animations to categories/sections and ensure service cards/accordion items have clear hover/focus styles.
Apply subtle reveal animations to the gallery grid and before/after section, avoiding heavy effects that could impact scrolling on mobile.

requirements.summary: Add a prominent offer banner (e.g., “Flat 20% off on Keratin Treatment”) at least on the Home page.
acceptanceCriteria: Offer banner is visible without requiring navigation to a hidden page.
Banner content matches the example offer text or uses a clearly marked placeholder offer in English.
Banner styling matches the luxury theme and remains readable on mobile.

file_operations.description: Create a premium-themed offer banner component (e.g., “Flat 20% off on Keratin Treatment”) with high readability on mobile. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Badge/Button) if helpful. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Render the OfferBanner prominently on the Home page (above the fold or near hero) and ensure it matches the black/gold/white theme.

requirements.summary: Add a premium membership/loyalty card section with benefits and a clear call-to-action using a distinct card layout consistent with the theme.
acceptanceCriteria: Membership section is present (Home or a dedicated section on another page is acceptable).
Section includes at least 3 benefits items and a clear call-to-action (e.g., “Ask at reception” or “Contact us” placeholder).
Membership content is presented using a card-like visual treatment (rounded, premium accents).

file_operations.description: Create a membership/loyalty section with a visually distinct premium card treatment (rounded, soft shadow, gold accents), at least 3 benefits, and a clear CTA. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button to maintain consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add the membership/loyalty card section to the Home page in an appropriate position (e.g., after services/testimonials) and ensure mobile-first layout.

requirements.summary: Add a mobile-friendly FAQ accordion with at least 6 treatment/hair-care Q&A items.
acceptanceCriteria: FAQ shows at least 6 questions with expandable answers.
Accordion interaction works via click/tap on mobile.
FAQ content is written in English and matches salon/treatment topics.

file_operations.description: Create an FAQ section using an accordion interaction pattern with at least 6 Q&A items about treatments/hair care. Use the shadcn-ui Accordion component for accessible accordion behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Render the FAQ accordion on the Services page (or other appropriate existing page) and ensure it is easy to use on mobile.

requirements.summary: Create a site-wide footer with social links, contact cues, and consistent branding.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all pages.
Footer includes at least 3 social links (placeholders allowed).
Footer styling is consistent with the black/gold/white theme and remains readable on mobile.

file_operations.description: Create a site-wide footer with consistent branding styling, contact cues, and at least 3 social links (placeholders acceptable). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the Footer into the shared layout so it appears consistently on all pages/routes.

requirements.summary: Add and render required static image assets from frontend/public/assets/generated for hero, gallery, before/after, and stylist imagery.
acceptanceCriteria: All required images are committed as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
UI components reference these local assets and render without broken links.
Gallery/hero/slider/stylist sections display the intended imagery on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Add the generated hero background image asset to frontend static assets at the specified path.
Add the generated hairstyle gallery image asset to frontend static assets at the specified path.
Add the generated interior gallery image asset to frontend static assets at the specified path.
Add the generated before/after haircut transformation image asset to frontend static assets at the specified path.
Add the generated before/after keratin/smoothening transformation image asset to frontend static assets at the specified path.
Add the generated stylist portrait image asset #1 to frontend static assets at the specified path.
Add the generated stylist portrait image asset #2 to frontend static assets at the specified path.

Reference and render the local hero and before/after assets (from frontend/public/assets/generated/baidees-hero-salon.dim_2400x1200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/baidees-before-after-haircut.dim_2000x1000.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/baidees-before-after-keratin.dim_2000x1000.png) so they display without broken links.

Reference and render local gallery assets (from frontend/public/assets/generated/baidees-gallery-hairstyles-1.dim_1200x1200.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/baidees-gallery-interior-1.dim_1200x1200.png) to populate a grid of at least 9 images via repetition/variants without external URLs.

Reference and render local stylist portrait assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/baidees-stylist-1.dim_800x1000.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/baidees-stylist-2.dim_800x1000.png) for at least two stylist profiles.
